content: 4mm g/6 hook for lacing cord pattern notes wind contrast color yarns into small balls to make color changing easier you will need six small balls each of mc and cc1 five small balls of cc2 and four small balls each of cc3 and cc4 to change colors yarn over with the new color to complete the last stitch in the old color each row begins with a starting chain-3 which counts as a double_crochet stitch work is turned after each row pattern shows directions for size xs m l xl 2x 3x 4x 5x 3 poncho front row 7 27 35 41 47 mc 3 cc1 3 cc2 row 14 repeat row 12 3 cc3 3 cc4 9 mc 3 cc4 3 cc3 3 cc2 3 row 15 repeat row 11 using mc chain 89 105 117 129 cc1 27 35 41 47 mc row 16 repeat row 10 row 1 double_crochet in 3rd chain from hook and each chain row 8 30 38 44 50 mc 3 cc1 3 cc2 across 87 double_crochet 103 double_crochet 115 double_crochet 127 double_crochet row 17 repeat row 9 3 cc3 3 cc4 3 mc 3 cc4 3 cc3 3 cc2 3 row 2 chain 3 counts as first st double_crochet in each cc1 30 38 44 50 mc row 18 repeat row 8 st across 87 double_crochet 103 double_crochet 115 double_crochet 127 double_crochet row 9 15 23 29 35 mc 3 cc1 3 cc2 row 19 repeat row 7 repeat row 2 six 8 10 11 more times 3 cc3 3 cc4 6 mc 3 cc1 3 cc2 3 cc3 row 20 repeat row 6 3 cc4 3 cc3 3 cc2 3 cc1 6 mc 3 cc4 3 row 21 repeat row 5 colorwork section cc3 3 cc2 3 cc1 15 23 29 35 mc row 22 repeat row 4 row 1 27 35 41 47 mc 3 cc1 3 cc2 row 10 18 26 32 38 mc 3 cc1 3 cc2 row 23 repeat row 3 3 cc3 3 cc4 6 mc 3 cc1 3 cc2 3 cc3 3 cc3 3 cc4 9 mc 3 cc4 3 cc3 3 cc2 3 3 cc2 3 cc1 6 mc 3 cc4 3 cc3 3 cc2 3 row 24 repeat row 2 cc1 27 35 41 47 mc cc1 18 26 32 38 mc row 25 repeat row 1 row 2 30 38 44 50 mc 3 cc1 3 cc2 3 cc3 3 cc4 3 mc 3 cc4 3 cc3 3 cc2 3 row 11 3 11 17 23 mc 3 cc1 3 cc2 repeat row 2 eight 10 12 13 times 3 cc3 3 cc4 6 mc twice 3 cc1 3 cc2 cc1 30 38 44 50 mc fasten_off and weave in ends 3 cc1 6 mc 3 cc4 3 cc3 3 cc2 3 cc1 row 3 33 41 47 53 mc 3 cc1 3 cc2 twice 3 11 17 23 mc 3 cc3 3 cc4 3 cc3 3 cc2 3 cc1 33
